sense.def:
To presume that something is the case
pomeni misliti, da je nekaj tako, kot pravimo, nismo pa o tem prepričani.

seg.quote: If you do not come, I shall presume the deal is off.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
and
TO-INF
or
COMPLEMENT

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is presumed to be the case
, ljudje mislijo, da je tisto res, niso pa o tem prepričani.

seg.quote: ...Larry Burrows, missing and presumed dead since 1971.
He is presumed to be living in Spain.
